blogs.title: White Core Phylosophy
blogs.body: There are so few scholars who even know about core, especially white, black, and void core. For now, I will explain about white core first.
blogs.author: alius

blogs.title: Solidify the Stardust to Use It as Weapon
blogs.body: At first, people underestimate my power because my power seems harmless and just aesthetic (stardust is ofcourse beautiful). Because people sees my power is harmless, they think I'm fragile since (they think) I can't defend myself with my owm power. But little they know, my power turns out to be one of the strongest
blogs.author: nebula

blogs.title: Adjust the Range of Extreme Gravity
blogs.body: When I was a kid, people often envy me just because I have this power. But in reality, my power is hard to control. One mistake and everything around me will vanish instantly
blogs.author: quasar
